name: Adventurers' Guild
skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw a follower.
Engage: Destroy this card. Select an allied follower on the field and give it Rush.
flavour_text: Folk from all manner of backgrounds gather together to tackle quests most arduous. This diversity begets all manner of new bonds forged. As long as there is work to be done, these halls will never empty.

questions.answer: Yes. Doing so will simply destroy it.
questions.question: Can I engage Adventurers' Guild even if there aren't any allied followers on the field?

name: Aerin, Crystalian Frostward
skill_text:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Ward
flavour_text: The Crystal Palace lies between the world of flesh and the world of frost. To enter its gates, one must step forth from the haze of lies and bare one's heart to the palace guards. Be found pure, and pass. Be found tainted, and never go anywhere again.
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Ward
evo_flavour_text: Frost is one of several symbols that represent Crystalians. Though seen as brittle in our own world, the frost in their fabled land is tougher than steel—tougher still when evil is near. Strong but beautiful, just like the people it symbolizes.

name: Albert, Levin Stormsaber
skill_text:
Enhance (9): Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. Give this follower "Can attack 2 times per turn."
Storm
flavour_text: Maybe darkness will win in the end. Maybe we're just a flash of lightning in an infinite night, destined to lose everything. That is why every moment we have left together is worth fighting for. In the name of all that you hold dear—Sky Knights, advance!
evo_skill_text:
Enhance (9): Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. Give this follower "Can attack 2 times per turn."
Storm
evo_flavour_text: The Levin soldier stumbles forward, his limbs buried in the half-light. As he thinks that he'll never escape this darkness, a lightning strike transforms the landscape, and he sees in its glare his love for his country, the mortality of the enemy, a way home.

name: Alouette, Doomwright Ward
skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.
Evolve: Select an Artifact follower in your hand that costs 5 or less and summon an exact copy of it.
flavour_text: The Mad God laughed. A god—mad or not—is still a god, and these children stood no chance. However, numbers were on the heroes' side. It was only a matter of time before they toppled their prey. —Tale of Eight Masks, Chapter 7
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.
Evolve: Select an Artifact follower in your hand that costs 5 or less and summon an exact copy of it.
evo_flavour_text:
Travel northeast to the excavation sites.
Seek the curious artificer who melds past and future.
Unmask them for what they truly are—the heavenly sphere of the northwest.

name: Amalia, Luxsteel Paladin
skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 4 copies of Steelclad Knight.
Whenever another allied follower enters the field, give it +1/+0, Rush, and Ward.
flavour_text: If you would fight for our world, you are just as much a hero as I. I raise my blade in the name of light! Knights of Lux, to me!
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 4 copies of Steelclad Knight.
Whenever another allied follower enters the field, give it +1/+0, Rush, and Ward.
evo_flavour_text:
The paladin is stern with her knights, and ever stricter with herself. Her heart is as the heroes of lore: noble, honest, and harder than steel—but soft for her dear companions.  
"Behold the might of Lux!"

name: Amataz, Origin Blader
skill_text:
Fanfare: Give this follower +X/+X. X is the number of Pixie followers in your hand.
Ward
Evolve: Do this X times: "Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower." X is the number of Pixie followers in your hand.
flavour_text: Like how detritus nurtures new vegetation, mastery of fairy swordsmanship is an endless cycle of death and rebirth. By the time I noticed this eternal clash, life had all but slipped away from me. But as long as the branches continue to grow, so too will I.
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Give this follower +X/+X. X is the number of Pixie followers in your hand.
Ward
Evolve: Do this X times: "Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower." X is the number of Pixie followers in your hand.
evo_flavour_text:
Decay has long been a source of life, providing nourishment to branches and leaves, and adding rings to countless trees. Knowing this, the blader looks fondly upon his age, seeing it as a chance for growth. 
"I am blessed—for mastery of the fairy blade is far yet."

name: Amelia, Silver Captain
skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw 2 Swordcraft followers. Recover 3 play points.
Super-Evolve: Give all other allied Swordcraft followers on the field Barrier.
flavour_text: I don't look back seeking the shadow of my father. I look back to revel in all that I've gained—all that I still have left to fight for. As captain of the Knights of Aelvoth, I will fulfill my duty!
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw 2 Swordcraft followers. Recover 3 play points.
Super-Evolve: Give all other allied Swordcraft followers on the field Barrier.
evo_flavour_text: It seems an oxymoron to fight for peace. But here, in the footprints of the invaders, among mangled crops and smoldering houses, there is no room for philosophy. The enemy speak the iron language, and that is how the Knights of Aelvoth will answer.

questions.answer: Yes, it will.
questions.question: If I super-evolve a Knight that's been given Barrier by Amelia, Silver Captain's Super-Evolve ability, then use it to attack an enemy follower, will the Knight lose Barrier?

name: Amorous Necromancer
skill_text: Evolve: Summon 2 copies of Ghost. Super-Evolve: Give them Drain.
flavour_text: Grief begets a love most passionate; therefore death leaves the soul swelling with ecstasy. You are lucky to have met me. Come now, let us share a fiery embrace.
evo_skill_text: Evolve: Summon 2 copies of Ghost. Super-Evolve: Give them Drain.
evo_flavour_text: Whom did they hate? What did they regret? These souls no longer know the answers to these queries. Sorrowful as they are, they continue to permeate the mortal realm. That is where I come in. Come now; allow thyselves to melt away in my arms.

name: Ancestral Crown
skill_text: Countdown (4) Whenever an allied follower enters the field, give it +1/+1.
flavour_text:
The weight of a crown is the weight of its history.
"Stop, you fools! Kill me, and you lose forever the greatest dynasty—"
Amid the roaring of the horde, the crown dropped onto the scaffold, silent as a feather.

name: Ancient Cannon
skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition to your hand.
Whenever you Fuse, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
flavour_text: Some people might consider creating a floating fortress equipped with a death laser that obliterates all who venture too close a tad overprotective... Those people clearly don't have daughters.

name: Angelic Prism Priestess
skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw an amulet.
Evolve: Select an amulet in your hand and reduce its cost by 1.
flavour_text: What is the right thing to do? What is the meaning of justice? There will be times when even the most widely-accepted ideals are called into question. "I've got some of my own justice right here, and I'm just itchin' to pound you with it!"
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw an amulet.
Evolve: Select an amulet in your hand and reduce its cost by 1.
evo_flavour_text: Faith lies in the righteous, and loyalty lies with the just... Or something like that! In any case, my justice is immortal, and my power eternal!

name: Anne & Grea, Mysterian Duo
skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon an Anne's Summoning. Spellboost your hand 3 times.
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.
flavour_text:
"Mysteria's great, isn't it? Talk about freedom!"
"Calm down, Anne. Everything in moderation, remember?"
"Hehe, my bad! I just love hanging out with you!"
—Anne & Grea, Mysterian Duo
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon an Anne's Summoning. Spellboost your hand 3 times.
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.
evo_flavour_text:
Anne's bright future could easily be clouded by her curiosity, were it not for Grea's prudence.
Grea's potential could easily be obscured by her anxieties, were it not for Anne's boldness.
Only together do they shine the brightest.

name: Anne's Summoning
skill_text: Rush Ward At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this card.
flavour_text:
An influx of magic stirs the immortal retainer.
 "O Spirit of War, awaken!"
evo_skill_text: Rush Ward At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this card.
evo_flavour_text:
The spellweaver effortlessly conjures her undying sword.
"Spirit, fell mine enemies. Smite all who seek Mysteria's destruction!"

name: Apollo, Heaven's Envoy
skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.
flavour_text: A young god descends to the land of strife, a bolt of light nocked upon his bow. He makes the heaven's intentions known as he preaches love, bringing temporary peace to the battlefield. —A World Bathed in Light, Preface
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.
evo_flavour_text: Oh yeah, I'm really likin' the vibe out here today! Yo, warrior dudes, listen up! I'm about to put on the show of a lifetime! If you've got the energy to fight, then you've definitely got the energy to paaarty! Now presenting my newest single, "Dazzling Me"!

name: Apprentice Astrologer
skill_text: Fanfare: Select a card in your hand and return it to deck. Draw a card. Gain an earth sigil.
flavour_text: Starlight, stars bright... How you dazzle me tonight! I wish I may, with all my might, have the chance to hold you tight.
evo_skill_text: Fanfare: Select a card in your hand and return it to deck. Draw a card. Gain an earth sigil.
evo_flavour_text:
Twinkle, twinkle, precious stars. Do you know how loved you are?
Up above me in the sky, you're the apples of my eye.
Twinkle, twinkle, shining stars. Astromancy's best by far.

questions.answer: Yes. Cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them.
questions.question: If I use Apprentice Astrologer's Fanfare ability to return a Blaze Destroyer whose cost has been reduced to 5 by its On Spellboost ability from my hand to my deck, will its cost still be 5 when I redraw it?

questions.answer: Yes. You will draw a card and gain an earth sigil without returning a card to your deck.
questions.question: If I play Apprentice Astrologer when it's the only card in my hand, will its Fanfare ability activate?

questions.answer: Yes, you will.
questions.question: There's only one empty spot on my field, but I already have an Earth Sigil amulet. If I play Apprentice Astrologer, will I gain an earth sigil from its Fanfare ability?

name: Aragavy, Eternal Hunter
skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 7 damage split between all enemy followers.
Evolve: Deal 3 damage to both leaders.
flavour_text: What are the conditions for victory? To be the last one standing. What are the conditions for defeat? To succumb and give up. He takes neither path. The hunt must—and will—go on!
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 7 damage split between all enemy followers.
Evolve: Deal 3 damage to both leaders.
evo_flavour_text: The contest meant to decide the fate of the world is interrupted by the crumbling of its stage. Chaos casts victory into the void; so into the void the wild warrior leaps. Wielding his mighty cudgel, Tetocamali, he is driven forward by an insatiable hunger.

questions.answer:
Damage split between enemies is dealt in order from oldest enemy follower on the field to newest (right to left), with each follower taking up to its defense in damage before the subsequent follower takes damage.

For example, if there are 3 enemy followers on the field with defense values of 3, 3, and 2 from right to left, they take 3, 3, and 1 damage, respectively.
questions.question: What does "deal 7 damage split between all enemy followers" mean?

questions.answer: Your opponent will win.
questions.question: If Aragavy, Eternal Hunter's Evolve ability activates when both leaders are at 3 defense, who will win the game?

name: Arcane Eruption
skill_text: Deal 2 damage to all followers. Earth Rite (1) - Draw a card.
flavour_text: A duel? Please. I bet you can't even touch me!

name: Aria, Lady of the Woods
skill_text:
Fanfare: Gain Crest: Aria, Lady of the Woods.
Super-Evolve: Summon 3 copies of Fairy.
flavour_text: I hear it on the wind. I hear it in the leaves. War is coming. Fair folk, we must abandon our trowels for swords and our reeds for drums—and trust that, no matter how thick the clouds of turmoil, the silver light of the moon will find its way back to us.
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Gain Crest: Aria, Lady of the Woods.
Super-Evolve: Summon 3 copies of Fairy.
evo_flavour_text: As the forest sleeps, she arms herself. The glow of her wings is faint, a lingering of warmth in the coal of night. Despite her fear, she will fight because she understands a basic truth. Darkness is the natural state of the world. Light must be created.

questions.answer: No, you can't have more than one of the same crest.
questions.question: If I already have Crest: Aria, Lady of the Woods, will Aria's Fanfare ability give me another?

name: Arms Peddler
skill_text: Rush Last Words: Draw a card.
flavour_text:
A merchant's job isn't just about selling.
See, finding the best wares calls for a certain... resourcefulness.

evo_flavour_text:
Welcome, traveler! Not sure what to buy?
How about this shiny sword? Had to trade blows with an enemy soldier for 'er, and in the end, he left with his life and I with this "steel"! Hehe.

name: Arriet, Luxminstrel
skill_text: Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Super-Evolve: Restore 4 defense instead.
flavour_text: Long ago, the world was drowned in darkness, and all was still. Just as the people felt their own lives grow dim, a soft tune rippled through the oppressive darkness. As it grew stronger, so too did the people's will, and soon it became a song of hope.
evo_skill_text: Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Super-Evolve: Restore 4 defense instead.
evo_flavour_text: Music transcends all—be it language, species, age, gender... or even time. A symphony will still sound grand no matter what your station in life is. So come, dear traveler, and listen as I play with all my heart.

name: Artifact Recharge
skill_text: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.
flavour_text:
"Thank you for your help. The artifact's energy levels have finally stabilized."
"My pleasure. Now the only limitation on our experiments will be the number of subjects..."
—Artifact research team member & team lead

name: Aryll, Moonstruck Vampire
skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Bat.
Whenever an allied Bat enters the field, give it Storm and deal 1 damage to your leader.
flavour_text: Unlike the moon, which waxes and wanes, she remains ever present throughout even the darkest of nights. Yet such a steadfast existence can be quite lonely, so she seeks a companion to keep her warm on these cold nights.
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Bat.
Whenever an allied Bat enters the field, give it Storm and deal 1 damage to your leader.
evo_flavour_text: I desire not your servitude nor protection. I've endured many a long, long night alone, and simply desire company. If you can provide me as such, then I will happily give my night to you.

name: Astaroth's Reckoning
skill_text: Set the enemy leader's max defense to 1.
flavour_text: Those who would dare to determine that which is sinful are tyrants. Reach out; grasp the fruit without fear of retribution. Be baptized in Judecca, and rebel against the lords of heaven. —The Hellrime Comedy, Verse IV

name: Avian Statue
skill_text:
Countdown (2) Last Words: Summon a Regal Falcon.
Engage (2): Advance this amulet's count by 2.
flavour_text:
I seek wonder to soothe my sorrows.
—Worshipper of the statue

name: Axe-Wielding Dragonslayer
skill_text: Ward
flavour_text:
Father, you once told me that a dragonslayer must be as proud and solitary as the beasts we hunt. You forget our history. Did our predecessors not take up their blades to protect the weak?
Virtue is found in compassion, not solitude.
evo_skill_text: Ward
evo_flavour_text:
She had the strength and nobility of a dragon. She had good intentions. But to a layperson, what is a beastslayer but the greatest beast of them all?
With each stroke of her axe, another bridge broken, another path closed.

name: Baby Carbuncle
skill_text:
Fanfare: Select another allied card on the field and return it to hand.
Super-Evolve: Recover 3 play points.
flavour_text: He plunges through the underbrush, seeking the mysterious carbuncle. Many famous researchers, great researchers, have tried to classify it and failed. But not him, he thinks, eyes gleaming like rubies. He is going to be different.
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Select another allied card on the field and return it to hand.
Super-Evolve: Recover 3 play points.
evo_flavour_text:
As the ruby in the carbuncle's forehead grows brighter day by day, the scholar's fervor for research wanes. Realizing a possible link, he formulates a hypothesis.
"Perhaps the jewel feeds on passion... But then again, who cares?"

questions.answer: You will recover 3 play points.
questions.question: I have 9 max play points with a Baby Carbuncle on my field. I use my bonus play point, then play a 3-cost Seraphic Tidings, leaving me with 7 play points. If I super-evolve Baby Carbuncle, how many play points will I recover with its Super-Evolve ability?

name: Balto, Dusk Bounty Hunter
skill_text: Fanfare: Gain Crest: Balto, Dusk Bounty Hunter.
flavour_text: By their very nature, demons do not experience any sort of growth. That is not to say that they never partake in the desires and delusions of mortals. The more humans covet and deceive, the more delectable the inevitable feast will be.
evo_skill_text: Fanfare: Gain Crest: Balto, Dusk Bounty Hunter.
evo_flavour_text:
Stubborn delusion serves as his meals. Unquenchable lust serves as a feast. 
"Come, one and all! Allow me to separate you from your riches."

questions.answer: Your opponent will win.
questions.question: If I have Crest: Balto, Dusk Bounty Hunter, and both leaders are at 1 defense, who will win the game at the end of my turn?

name: Bat
skill_text: Drain
flavour_text:
Peer not at them. Do not chase nor approach them.
—Advice from a villager
Seek them out. Give chase and shoot.
—Advice from a hunter
evo_skill_text: Drain
evo_flavour_text: To the powerless, they are an omen. To the powerful, they are a sign of the struggles to come. Run away or approach; it matters not to the lord at the center of the swarm.

name: Battleforged Dragon Keeper
skill_text: Enhance (7): Summon a Vastwing Dragon.
flavour_text:
I exist in negatives. I am neither dragon nor human.
My mother neither wanted me, nor cared enough to discard me.
I am beholden to nothing and no one but myself.
evo_skill_text: Enhance (7): Summon a Vastwing Dragon.
evo_flavour_text: She grew up in the place between, suspended between dragons and humans. Though she lacked the love of kin, she was also unburdened by hate for otherness. By not belonging to a single nation, she was a daughter of the world.

name: Bayle, Luxglaive Warrior
skill_text:
Activates in hand. Whenever an allied follower leaves the field, reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.
flavour_text: Years ago, when the encroaching night threatened to swallow us, heroes rose to reclaim day's light. Those individuals came to be known as the Knights of Lux—shining beacons of our miraculous salvation.
evo_skill_text:
Activates in hand. Whenever an allied follower leaves the field, reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.
evo_flavour_text: Those blessed with Lux's power were varied and many—each attending to duties unique. Clash though they did, the knights were brought together by the tireless work of a kind warrior. "Please, just calm down and cooperate..."

questions.question: If an allied Fairy is destroyed during my opponent's turn, would the cost of a Bayle, Luxglaive Warrior in my hand be reduced by 1?

name: Beryl, Nightmare Incarnate
skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Evolve: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
flavour_text: Everyone keeps going on about how "existence is a nightmare" or some such nonsense. Just what the hell is going on up there in the human world? Let me show you a real, true nightmare!
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Evolve: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
evo_flavour_text: Mortals seem to suffer under nothing but endless toil these days. That's great for my line of work, but maybe I should help them out and do something about all that. How? Oh, I have my ways!

name: Blaze Destroyer
skill_text: On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
flavour_text:
My order to the beast will be simple: Burn it all.
Surely I will be the first to burn, but what of it? Such concerns will only impede progress.
—Remains of a singed research log
evo_skill_text: On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
evo_flavour_text:
A dragon requires the life force needed to survive through the ages.
A demon requires the infernal energy to plunge the world into darkness.
This creature possess great power, but no purpose.

name: Bramble Burst
skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field or the enemy leader and deal it 3 damage.
flavour_text: A yearning for beauty is what turns a man's heart crimson.

name: Bug Alert
skill_text: Select an allied card on the field and return it to hand. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
flavour_text:
Bugs swarm to warn and protect.

The language of insects is one of wings and shapes.

name: Bullet from Beyond
skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it. Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

The low flame roils, irritated and indignant at the boredom that plagues it. What is a fire to do with nothing to burn?

name: Calamity Breath

flavour_text: As the dragon slept, the land grew wild, fertilized by humanity's rotting avarice. The rich preyed on the poor, until at last, the starving masses prayed unto the dragon for equality. And their prayer was heard. —The City of Towers: A Tragedy

name: Capricious Sprite
skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Fairy. Add a Fairy to your hand.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.
flavour_text: A new wind has all the trees in a rustle. For the first time, a fairy was seen playing tricks on its own kind.

name: Caravan Mammoth

evo_flavour_text: Mammoths typically sleep standing, ever alert to danger. Once they have become accustomed to the environment, they may sleep lying down. Such is the explanation given for the night the caravan fell. —A Caravan's Hierarchy, The Downfall

name: Celestial Shikigami
skill_text: Ward Last Words: Spellboost your hand 3 times.
flavour_text: When Onmyodo masters fold with fingertips that burn with god-power, this being is what appears. The white miracle, the celestial shikigami. Before it, all who have not touched the face of divinity are as insubstantial as paper in the wind.
evo_skill_text: Ward Last Words: Spellboost your hand 3 times.
evo_flavour_text:
(What do you mean, "What is that?" It says "shikigami," you imbecile. Learn to read.)
(What are those supposed to be? Doodles?)
(Let me show you the real deal...)

name: Centaur Centurion
skill_text: Storm
flavour_text:
His exploits on the battlefield pleased his superiors, and he was deemed fit to serve human society.
"Why tolerate these half-beasts? To win wars."
So spoke the founder of the Beastman Battalion before his untimely death.
evo_skill_text: Storm
evo_flavour_text: What is humanity without its tools, its armor, its animal thralls? Beastfolk, on the other hand, are a force unto themselves. There was never any question as to who would emerge victorious from the dust of the Centaur Insurrection.

name: Cerberus, Hellfire Unleashed
skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound and Coco, Left Paw Hellhound. Necromancy (6) - Give all other allied followers on the field +2/+0.
Super-Evolve: Do this 2 times: "Reanimate (1)."
flavour_text:
Assessment impossible and unnecessary.
—Gods of the netherworld
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound and Coco, Left Paw Hellhound. Necromancy (6) - Give all other allied followers on the field +2/+0.
Super-Evolve: Do this 2 times: "Reanimate (1)."
evo_flavour_text:
Boring. Uninteresting. Pointless. These are just some of the scathing words that she has used to describe her job. Though vast and expansive, it seems that the netherworld is much too small of a realm for her.
"Woof! Nothin' to it but cause a lot of trouble!"

name: Ceres, Blue Rose Maiden

flavour_text:
The magnificent blue rose blooms under the night sky; and as her lips curl into a bewitching smile, she offers her hand.
"If you still wish for us to be together, then I would be remiss not to accept."
evo_skill_text: Bane At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader. If this follower is super-evolved, restore 4 instead and give this follower Barrier.
evo_flavour_text: My hands are as cold as this chilly evening. Won't you warm them? Share your heat with me... always and forever. Promise.

name: Chaos Cyclone

flavour_text: Life is akin to the pages of a tome. Hatred anew can always be found by turning to the verses bookmarked by animosity, enmity, and malice.

questions.answer: Its cost will be 6 when you redraw it, since cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them. questions.answer: Its X value will be 4 when you redraw it, since cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them. It will then be spellboosted a total of 6 times—once from your having played a spell and 5 times from the "spellboost your hand 5 times" part of Dimension Climb's ability—increasing its X value to 10.

Damage split between enemies is dealt in order from oldest enemy follower on the field to newest (right to left), with each follower taking up to its defense in damage before the subsequent follower takes damage.

For example, if there are 3 enemy followers on the field with defense values of 3, 3, and 2 from right to left, and X is 7, then they will take 3, 3, and 1 damage, respectively.

evo_flavour_text: Sooo, you want me to tell the villagers that the rivers are gonna be too giving and could accidentally smother their crops? ...Far out. But, like, what exactly do you mean by "with more urgency and atmosphere"?

name: Wild Profusion
skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Fairy to your hand.
Countdown (2) Whenever an allied Pixie follower enters the field, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
flavour_text: Poachers make such lovely flowers.

skill_text:

flavour_text: Curious about our student body, are you? Well, Mysteria believes diversity leads to innovation, which means many of our pupils are rather... unique. It's actually quite rare to find an absolutely normal, 100-percent-mundane student like me.

X starts at 0. On Spellboost: Increase X by 1.

evo_flavour_text:
Oi, numbskull! Whaddaya think yer doin', runnin' through the hall like a—
Argh! I slipped up again! Why is it so hard to sound like normal, respectable folk?!

name: Winged Statue
skill_text:

flavour_text:
On the wings of this towering statue are our teachings. Offer prayer, and you will yet be saved from certain demise.
—A message to the wingless

skill_text:
Fanfare: Select another allied follower on the field and give it +1/+1.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.
flavour_text: Human legs cannot summit the crags of the holy peak. The bodies of ground-dwelling beasts cannot survive in the surrounding harsh environ. One such as you cannot possibly hope to invade our sacred realm.
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Select another allied follower on the field and give it +1/+1.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.
evo_flavour_text: Ah, the mightiest of wings and the finest of armor. Who would dare attempt to disturb our peace? Best go on the patrol, just in case. Wait... Where was the nest again?

name: Witch's New Brew
skill_text:

Earth Sigil
Engage (1): Gain an earth sigil.

Ingredients: Moon-dried pork (his fave!), bat eye, nether toad
Recipe: Give it a sweet, slow burn over heartfelt flames ♡
Don't forget the armored scorpion! It made him cry tears of joy last time.
—Scribbling from a witch's notepad

questions.answer: Yes, you can.
questions.question: I engage a Witch's New Brew, then play another Witch's New Brew from my hand. If I still have at least 1 play point, can I engage the second copy as well?

name: Workin' Grasshopper
skill_text: Fanfare: Draw an X-cost follower. X is your Combo.
flavour_text: Miss Cricket? Yeah, we're distant cousins or summat. But don't hive me up with that deadbeat musician. I'm a workin' bug, hear? Proprietor of a flower shop downriver. Be sure to buzz on by when you've got extra honey in your pockets.
evo_skill_text: Fanfare: Draw an X-cost follower. X is your Combo.
evo_flavour_text: Don't even get me started on Cousin Locust. Shows up every harvest season with his big ol' mandibles and helps himself to your hard work without so much as a please or thank you. Gets my wings in a bunch just thinkin' about it!

name: Yuna, Occult Hunter
skill_text: Ward Last Words: Add a Ghost and Bat to your hand.
flavour_text: I sneak sneakily through the eerie dregs of the night. It's pretty creepy out here, ya know? Like, I'm pretty scared! What if a beautiful babe pops outta the bushes to startle me? My heart... would probably stop! Those vampire ladies are just too dang cute!
evo_skill_text: Ward Last Words: Add a Ghost and Bat to your hand.
evo_flavour_text: From a lovely flower patch in the darkest depths of the night, you can hear her extol. "Beautiful people must be protected at all costs," sings the former vampire hunter. Now dedicated to protecting pretty ladies, she brings a flicker of light to the eeriest of nights.

name: Zahar, Stormwave Dragoon
skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Vastwing Dragon.
Ward
flavour_text: We humans can't overpower dragons, so we got to outlast 'em. If yer sword and will holds past their scaley hulls, you win. If not, well―might be one or two worse ways to go.
evo_skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Vastwing Dragon.
Ward
evo_flavour_text:
The dragoon had no inherent gift but his strength of spirit. All other power he harvested, battle by battle, scale by scale.
"Summons from Princess Otohime? Say no more. I smell dragon blood on the wind."

name: Zell, Windreader
skill_text: Super-Evolve: Select another allied follower on the field and give it Storm.
flavour_text:
The wounds from the monster attack ran deep and should have severed forever the boy's connection to the sky. But then he met a lost dragonrider who shared his dream.
She would become his wings and he her direction.
evo_skill_text: Super-Evolve: Select another allied follower on the field and give it Storm.
evo_flavour_text:
I want nothing more than to fly again. To be back where it's all clear skies and freedom.
But I've lost my wings. I can read the wind, but I can no longer ride it. I'm stranded here until a miracle comes along.

name: Zirconia, Ironcrown Ward

flavour_text: The wards recall their past lives fighting in a war that wrenched at the tides of the universe itself. Their masks came from the vault of heaven—a rejection of appearances, a symbol of impossible hope. —Tale of Eight Masks, Chapter 5

Travel to the nation that towers in the northwest.
Seek the warrior-monarch whose sword and spirit
are forged of steel.
